text: Goren is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Arthur A. Goren, scholar and professor of American Jewish history *Charles Goren, American bridge player, writer, and advocate *Harriet Goren, American graphic designer and artist *Lee Goren, Canadian hockey player *Shlomo Goren, former Ashkenazi Chief Rabbi of Israel *Ran Goren *Shlomo Goren ==Fictional characters== *Robert Goren, a character in the television series Law & Order: Criminal Intent
title: Goren (surname)
